actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for a 7-percent increase in social security benefits beginning with benefits payable for the month of January 1974.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: States that the increases in the monthly benefits and lump sum death payments under title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act shall be increased by 7 percent beginning January 1974 (presently increased by the percentage by which the Consumer Price Index for June 1973 exceeds that for June 1972, beginning April 1974.)

titles.title: A bill to provide for a 7-percent increase in social security benefits beginning with benefits payable for the month of January 1974.
